item.title: A son of film director Rob Reiner and Michele Singer Reiner has been arrested and booked on suspicion of murder after the couple were found dead in their Los Angeles home. #RobReiner #LosAngeles #US #Hollywood #BBCNews
item.description: A son of film director Rob Reiner and Michele Singer Reiner has been arrested and booked on suspicion of murder after the couple were found dead in their Los Angeles home. #RobReiner #LosAngeles #US #Hollywood #BBCNews

item.title: US President Donald Trump criticised Rob Reiner on social media, saying, without evidence, that the deaths of him and his wife, Michele Singer Reiner, were linked to what he called “Trump Derangement Syndrome”. Reiner was a vocal critic of the president.
item.description: US President Donald Trump criticised Rob Reiner on social media, saying, without evidence, that the deaths of him and his wife, Michele Singer Reiner, were linked to what he called “Trump Derangement Syndrome”. Reiner was a vocal critic of the president.

item.title: The man who tackled one of the Bondi shooters has spoken from hospital as he recovers from his injuries and been visited by Anthony Albanese, who praised him as “the best of our country”. #AhmedAlAhmed #BondiBeach #Bondi #Australia #BBCNews

item.title: US President Donald Trump has filed a $5bn (£3.7bn) lawsuit against the BBC over an edit of his 6 January 2021 speech in a Panorama documentary. The BBC apologised to Trump last month, but rejected his demands for compensation and disagreed there was any
item.description: US President Donald Trump has filed a $5bn (£3.7bn) lawsuit against the BBC over an edit of his 6 January 2021 speech in a Panorama documentary. The BBC apologised to Trump last month, but rejected his demands for compensation and disagreed there was any

item.title: The victims of the Bondi Beach attack include a 10-year-old girl, a British-born rabbi, a retired police officer and a Holocaust survivor. Eight people remain in a critical condition in hospital. #Bondi #BondiBeach #Australia #News #BBCNews
